title: Stand aside, Evenepoel: Cian Uijtdebroeks steps up as the Belgian sensation of the Vuelta a España
content:
20-year-old grand tour rookie stunned in the Vuelta's opening summit finish and is promising a lot more to come.

Read the full article at Stand aside, Evenepoel: Cian Uijtdebroeks steps up as the Belgian sensation of the Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
